title.narrative: Madhya Pradesh Urban Services Improvement Project

description.narrative: The proposed Project will support government in improved and sustainable urban services to approximately 1.7 million people in 64 towns of the State (geographic coverage), improved institutional and financial management capacity of benefitting urban local bodies, and the development and operationalization of the Madhya Pradesh Urban Development Company Limited . The proposed Project will be implemented over 5 years from 2017 through 2022 (time slice).

participating-org.narrative: Madhya Pradesh Urban Development Company Limited
Urban Administration and Development Department of the Government of Madhya Pradesh

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Reports and Recommendations of the President
Volumetric water billing service delivered to 100% households coupled with GOMP-led urban property tax reforms and e-governance (2015 baseline: 0)
